meanings.definition: The quality or state of being soothing.
meanings.sent1: The baby's crying was instantly calmed by the soothingness of the lullaby.
meanings.sent2: I love the soothingness of a warm cup of tea after a long day.
meanings.sent3: The soothingness of the gentle breeze made the trees dance in delight.
meanings.sent4: Her voice had a soothingness that could calm even the most anxious souls.
meanings.sent5: The soothingness of the ocean waves lulled me into a peaceful sleep.

meanings.definition: The act of soothing or calming.
meanings.sent1: The soothingness of her touch eased the pain in my shoulder.
meanings.sent2: The soothingness of his words helped me relax before the big presentation.
meanings.sent3: The soothingness of the massage chair made me feel like I was floating on a cloud.
meanings.sent4: The soothingness of the hot bath melted away all my stress and worries.
meanings.sent5: The soothingness of the music filled the room, creating a sense of peace.
